author: Peter Wright
content:
What a great wee movie, thanks.

Two of my favourite films are “Captains Courageous” with Freddy Bartholomew and Spencer Tracy about a boy falling of a cruise liner and being picked up by a Portuguese fisherman. There are some simillarities to this wee movie. The special effects when the mast breaks were real and the film of the schooners is fantastic. I bought it on Amazon for a few quid.

https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Captains_Courageous_(1937_film)

Also, “Down to the Sea in Ships” with Richard Widmark. Another coming of age movie.
